chapters.title: Hello, World
chapters.content: In the beginning, there was a program. It printed 'Hello, World!' and thus began the journey of countless developers around the globe.

chapters.title: The First Bug
chapters.content: After mastering 'Hello, World!', a new developer ventured into more complex code. But alas, their program encountered a bug. Debugging became their new superpower.

chapters.title: Hello, JSON
chapters.content: Years later, the same developer discovered JSON. It was simple, elegant, and universal. They whispered to their code editor, 'Hello, JSON!' and the data responded beautifully.
